long_description: Nikwax Tech Wash(R) removes dirt and stains from your waterproof clothing and equipment while also safely revitalizing breathability and water repellency. Protects the water repellency of rainwear made with Gore-Tex(R), REI Elements(R), eVent(R) and other waterproof breathable coatings or laminates. Tech Wash is a non-detergent soap which can be used regularly to clean clothing and equipment without damaging the Durable Water Repellent (DWR) coating. Works well with a wash-in waterproofer such as Nikwax TX Direct (sold separately).
short_description: Nikwax Tech Wash(R) removes dirt and stains from your waterproof clothing and equipment while also safely revitalizing breathability and water repellency.
